title: MY TBH - Rilo

replies.body:
Oh gosh,

I don't hate you in any way, but I have lost respect for you. I get your occasional jokes, they are funny, some are lame, but most of them are funny. I've seen 2 sides of you, one side I like, one I don't. One side is where you are funny, chill, looking out for others. Your 2nd side is being a total dick, stupid jokes and tryharding for anything. I'm not trying to be hypocritical here but when you are in your "Chill Cabin' you are extremely immature. rude and stupid, which I understand you are allowed to be but it's just quite annoying. Don't private message me about this, I know you probably don't care what I think but whatever.
replies.body_tagged:

Don't private message me about this, I know you probably don't care what I think but whatever.

replies.body: I know I was always annoying to you, but I still find you are a pretty chill guy. You are extremely funny in your youtube videos and very mature when you moderated. Don't know what else to say really? Have a nice day?
replies.body_tagged: I know I was always annoying to you, but I still find you are a pretty chill guy. You are extremely funny in your youtube videos and very mature when you moderated. Don't know what else to say really? Have a nice day?

replies.body:
Boy, haven't you developed? I remember the old "sheamus4414", extremely fun to play walls with, extremely fun to talk with. I remember all the times I "MENTORED" you, to get Moderator. When you got senior I felt we spoke less and less each day, and when we did speak it was pretty much...

Rilo: "HEY CAMMY"
Cammy: "Hey RILO"

Then one of us would probably go AFK. If I was honest I feel you have gotten more immature since 2014 and 2015, but idk, could be wrong because I was gone for quite a bit. When you hang around the "Chill Cabin", I guess you are pretty different, but overall you are a pretty nice guy.

replies.body: I mean, we never really speak. I don't hate you in anyway, and wouldn't have a reason to. On the forums you are a pretty cool guy, and hopefully, you don't hate me much.
replies.body_tagged: I mean, we never really speak. I don't hate you in anyway, and wouldn't have a reason to. On the forums you are a pretty cool guy, and hopefully, you don't hate me much.

replies.body: Again, like SamuelJacob9. we have never really spoken. Overall, you are a pretty good player and a good defender. I only really see you in scrims against Celestial and a bit on public.

replies.body: Nice guy, decent player. Pretty fun to chill and talk with.
replies.body_tagged: Nice guy, decent player. Pretty fun to chill and talk with.

replies.body:
Alright, here w e go.

About a year and a half ago we were pretty good friends, we spoke a lot on ts, things were fine. When I came back, I found you annoying and very cocky. I feel you want the attention when all the attention you get is people telling you to 'fuck off'. I find you doing things just for the sake of doing them, without you even noticing how big of an idiot you are. You are also a smartass some of the time, which is quite annoying but that's your way.I also don't get changing your name every month, it's quite stupid, but it's your decision, so do what you like.

replies.body: I used to find you VERY ANNOYING, but I find you are chill now, You are a pretty decent player, and that's all I really have to say.

replies.body: A legend. Really mature and nice to hang out with, always having a laugh. Has a good American accent <3 #respect. The only time I hated you was when you always killed me in walls but you are a fucking legend.
